name: Doodle Royale
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36

Welcome to the Paper Arena. You'll be competing in the Doodle Royale! Pick up one of three weapons and hack n' slash your way through hundreds of monsters!

THEME: Ancient Technology

ENGINE: Unity

ART: Photo Shop

FEATURES

-1-2 players

-10 waves

-3 weapons

WEAPONS

-Club (Wack 'em)

-Bean Can (Gas 'em)

-Cat-O-Pult (Meow 'em) (to aim hold down the action key)

CONTROLS --(Typo in game. Please read)--

-pause: "p" key

Player 1:

-move: wasd keys

-action: space bar

Player 2:

-move: arrow keys

-action: "/" key

SOCIAL MEDIA

Twitter: @A_W_Apps

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/awappsut

Website: http://www.a-w-apps.com

Dev Note: I hope you enjoy my game. I worked hard on it up to the last minute. I even worked on it in between my college classes. Even though there is no sound, I would still call this one my best Ludum Dare games yet!
